<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.FormStateAjax</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description>Saves the state of a form (in your session). Used with reference qualifiers.</description> <name>FormStateAjax</name> <script><![CDATA[var FormStateAjax = Class.create();
FormStateAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, { process: function() { var rm = new GlideRequestMap(this.request); session.putProperty("client_record_current_map", rm); },
type: "FormStateAjax" });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2009-02-10 23:50:40</sys_created_on> <sys_id>629956700a0a0bb90007373aebeae73f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>FormStateAjax</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">079c7c036d2220100acb70b3534330b0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_629956700a0a0bb90007373aebeae73f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>pat.casey</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2009-11-11 16:49:20</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>285</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
